sentences.english: Simple cysts are difficult to distinguish from arachnoid cyst or epidermoid.

sentences.english: What advantage melanism brings in these circumstances is obscure.

sentences.english: A fissure is a linear cleft through the epidermis, or into the dermis.

sentences.english: With pure white as its interior color, pavilions have a colorful exterior appearance.

sentences.english: The skin biopsy specimen showed the histologic features of epidermolytic hyperkeratosis .

sentences.english: Along with the clinical improvement the spongiform pustules vanished, and the inflammation in dermis also lessened.

sentences.english: On the leaf epidermis of tribe Triticeae (Gramineae) in relation to its taxonomical significance.

sentences.english: It consists of a semi-transparent media-facade echoing the latest news.
sentences.chinese: 它包括一个半透明的媒体表皮，这里呈现最近的新闻。

sentences.english: Cable structure can prevent the water into the motor when the cable skin damaged.

sentences.english: The female archesporium differentiates from the single cell under the epidermis of nucellus.
